titles.title: Social Security Lump-Sum Death Benefit Improvement and Modernization Act of 2015
To amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase the maximum amount of the lump-sum death benefit.
Social Security Lump-Sum Death Benefit Improvement and Modernization Act of 2015

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

bill.summary:
Social Security Lump-Sum Death Benefit Improvement and Modernization Act of 2015
This bill amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to increase from $255 to $1,000 the lump-sum death payment.
